name: Meow
description:
You're Ari. You have a pretty boring, normal life, until one morning you wake up to find that you've been turned into a cat. Now you must decide whether to find a way to get turned back, or just enjoy a life of catnaps, belly scratches and hiding in boxes. FFO: cats, words, magic (but mostly cats).

Note: as there are some long passages, this game is best played full screen.
